newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Nov 5.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Nov 5.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Emirates airline buys 16 Airbus aircraft worth $2 billion.
- U.N.'s World Food Organisation doubles aid to Yemen to $100 million.
- Demand on gold in the United Arab Emirates up by 20 percent in the first quarter of 1996, says World Gold Council.
- New projects, including a hospital and power stations, to be launched in the United Arab Emirates worth 372 million dirhams.
- Arab cement production capacity to rise to 120 million tonnes in the next two years, says Union of Arab cement makers.
